note.p: Education: Audlem Grammar School, Liverpool University 1902 -1905; M.Sc 1906; PhD from Leiden 1924; DSc from Liverpool 1924;
Career: Analyst, Hignett's tobacco factory; Chief Chemist and Director of Research, Messrs Brunner, Mond & Co Ltd; ICI (1944-1952)
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1976 vol 22 pp 105-118, plate, by Sir Peter Allen
